result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott T. Strykowski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • OWI (5th or 6th), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Any vehicle titled or registered in defendant's name is subject to IID as is defendant himself.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

timeConds.notes:
With huber for caring for parents if approved.
Report to jail within 45 days.
No objection to EMP.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Case called:  11:11 am
Clerk: Kassidi
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher.
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Rick Cveykus.
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed.  
PLEA: OWI (5th)>>NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H - 3 year probation. CONDITIONS: 8 months MCJ w/Huber privilges and for caring for parents if approved and to report to jail within 45 days, COURT finds 3 days credit, No objection to EMP. Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 36 months as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed immediately; $50 IID installation fee to be paid. 36 dl revocation; AODA, Absolute sobriety, $1,000 fine plus Court Costs. 
Adjourned: 11:22 am
Plea hearing on March 12, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on February 10, 2015 at 09:00 am.
